{{wikipedia|Wall (Chinese constellation)}}

===Etymology===
From Chinese [[壁]] ("[[wall]]") + [[宿]] ("[[lunar]] [[mansion]]"), to clarify the intended sense of [[壁]]

|m=Bìxiù

===Proper noun===
{{zh-proper noun}}

# {{lb|zh|astronomy}} the [[Wall]], a [[Chinese]] [[constellation]] near [[Pegasus]] and [[Andromeda]], 14th of the [[w:Twenty-Eight_Mansions|Twenty-Eight Mansions]] ({{l|zh|二十八宿}}) and part of the [[w:Black_Tortoise|Black Turtle]] ({{l|zh|玄武}}).
